title: I Heart Intelligence - Intelligence Is Sexy
cleaned_text:
Is depression actually trying to SAVE us?

We keep considering depression to be an illness, but what if it comes to save us? According to Wikipedia, depression is "a state of low mood and aversion to activity." Merriam Webster describes it as "a state of feeling sad," or "a mood…
